attributes.comment:
Your new proposed rules, increasing the fee for those who still have a little love for
this country, will further damage the already damaged international image of the
United States. If everything is money oriented, what purpose we could achieve
when we try to advertise "freedom and democracy?"
As ordinary people, we have no power over whatever you want to do. You have
the money and power, just go ahead abuse them all. There will be one day that
no one wants to come to this country and you will all lose your job. The more
damage you do now, the faster that day will come.
Sincerely,
Totally disgusted
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Josh M. Stone
